mapper.update: update TBL_MEMBER set mem_email = #{mem_email}, mem_birth = #{mem_birth}, mem_phone = #{mem_phone}, mem_zip_code = #{mem_zip_code}, mem_addr = #{mem_addr}, mem_udate = now() where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_DEL_MEMBER (del_id, del_name, del_email, del_birth, del_phone, del_zip_code, del_addr, del_cdate, del_ddate, del_point, del_adminck) values (#{mem_id},#{mem_name},#{mem_email},#{mem_birth},#{mem_phone}, #{mem_zip_code},#{mem_addr}, #{mem_cdate}, now(), #{mem_point}, #{mem_adminck})
mapper.update: update rent001.TBL_RESERVE set res_status = case when res_rental_date <= now() and res_return_date >= now() then '이용중' when res_return_date < now() then '이용완료' else res_status end, res_modi_date = NOW() where res_mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select r.*, p.pay_status, p.pay_pid from TBL_RESERVE as r left join TBL_PAYMENT as p on r.res_rid = p.pay_res_rid where res_mem_id = #{mem_id}
